title: Random lag
body: Getting annoying lag in ranked games mainly. Shoots up to 1k+ and the ol' attempting to reconnect announcement pops up. Pretty certain it's the servers because everything else is running fine. It's been happening for weeks and everytime it does i leave in hopes of when i come back it'll be fixed. Never is. Any help would be appreciated. Ty

replies.body: I have the same problem except that my ping shoots up to 2000 ping and it is pure insane.

Really makes it less desirable to play. Apparently there was a 'fix' for it early this month but i can't find any difference. It's a shame because it makes people rage and you only have 2 options, sit in base till the games over or run in and feed enemies. Either way your team mates aren't gonna' be happy with you.

This was posted by Rioter

Hey,

Your ping is related to the quality of your internet connection and the path between your computer and the League of Legends servers. 600 sounds super high and must really be a pain to try and play with!

A few questions:
- What location/city are you playing from?
- What ISP do you use?
- Do you use Wifi or a cable to connect your computer to your modem/router?

BTW - Here's a pretty good article about troubleshooting connection issues on our support site, with quite a few good suggestions of things you can try. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Let me know how you go!
Cheers
Mindstar
